name: Dodge Pollution
description:
Dodge Pollution

Help Eduardo (The turtle) to dodge the pollution of the sea.
This project tries to make people aware of the need to reduce pollution in the sea.

CONTROLS:
  • Use A to move left and D to move right
  • Use left arrow and right arrow to move
  • Use the tactile of the smartphone to move
TEAM:

@Mister - Programmer, Game Designer
@Marfu - Dog,  Game Designer

MUSIC:

 by Eric Matyas  www.soundimage.org
